S

ScrollableComponent - Interface in moulton.scalable.draggables
Components that have attached ScrollBars should implement this interface.
ScrollBar - Class in moulton.scalable.draggables
The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.
ScrollBar(boolean, Panel, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class moulton.scalable.draggables.ScrollBar
Creates a scroll bar that will reside on the grid in the parent panel.
